snippet: A series of radio ads about childhood obesity will run in all 150 markets Clear Channel radio stations serve, reaching about 237 million listeners each month.
abstract: Jane L Levere Advertising column; Advertising Council joins forces with Clear Channel Media and Entertainment to run a new series of radio ads about childhood obesity.
lead_paragraph: A series of radio ads about childhood obesity will run in all 150 markets Clear Channel radio stations serve, reaching about 237 million listeners each month.

headline.seo: Campaign Promotes Healthy Eating Habits in Children
headline.main: An Anti-Obesity Campaign Takes to the Airwaves
headline.print_headline: An Anti-Obesity Campaign Takes to the Airwaves
